q: Unlike "American Idol," "The X Factor" has no upper age limit for contestants. The show is open to singers and vocal groups; contestants must be 12 and older. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, Simon Cowell said in a release from Fox.
